title: True Colors
lyrics:
Haneul wi guleum-i jinaganda
Hayan bich-e Look at the sky
Geulae naege
Geulae naege
You are light to me



Deo keuge Woo Ya nega saeng-gaghan Paint

Nae mamsog Blue

Are you gonna change this game

He was in a lot of pain

Neoui doum-e tto Gain hae

Nan salang-e geueughan bich-eul bala beonjyeo bolasaeg



Aleumdaun saeg-eulo muldeulge

Heugbaeg sog-eseo neol chajge



Neoui bich-eulo I live

Naui bich-eulo



Nega naelyeoseo

Nan kkoch-i doego iss-eo

Neowa dalm-eun haneul-ui bich-eun

Ttatteushae nal muldeulge hae



Bich-i doeeoseo

Seumyeodeulgo iss-eo

Nega dagaon sungan-e

Nan byeonhae gago iss-eo



True colors yeah

Nega naleul bulleojul ttae



True colors yeah

Aleumdabge muldeul-yeojwo



Firework naege dagawa sappunhi nega dah-eul ttae

An boyeo neobakk-e dulman haja Party

Deo Vividhage sogsag-yeojwo naege

If you want some more drop that curtain



Ne moseub-eul balaboda

Saeng-gag-i na neowa hamkkehan sigan



Neoui bich-eulo I live

Naui bich-eulo



Nega naelyeoseo

Nan kkoch-i doego iss-eo

Neowa dalm-eun haneul-ui bich-eun

Ttatteushae nal muldeulge hae



Bich-i doeeoseo

Seumyeodeulgo iss-eo

Nega dagaon sungan-e

Nan byeonhae gago iss-eo



Neolo inhae sal-aga

Naege seonmulhaejun geu bich-eulo



Jeomjeom palaejyeo jeomjeom hayaejyeo

Gyesog muldeul-eo



You light me up

You light me up



Nega naelyeoseo

Nan kkoch-i doego iss-eo

Neowa dalm-eun haneul-ui bich-eun

Ttatteushae nal muldeulge hae



Bich-i doeeoseo

Seumyeodeulgo iss-eo

Nega dagaon sungan-e

Nan byeonhae gago iss-eo



True colors yeah

Nega naleul bulleojul ttae



True colors yeah

Aleumdabge muldeul-yeojwo
